definitions: To pierce or prick with a pointed instrument.
To cut a scalloped or zigzag edge on cloth with pinking shears.
To make a knocking or pinging sound, especially of an internal combustion engine.
To decorate with a pink color.
examples: The tailor will pink the edges of the fabric.
The old engine started to pink.
The chef will pink the salmon slightly.
She decided to pink the nursery walls.
